RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui Doutorado em Música pela Universidade Federal da Bahia (2010), Graduação pela Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais (1992) - e especialização no exterior (Itália e Suécia) em quatro academias europeias: Accademia Chigiana di Siena, Arts Academy of Rome, Reale Accademia Filarmonica di Bologna, Royal College of Music in Stockholm. Por sua obra obteve 29 premiações nacionais e internacionais.Tem experiência na área de Artes, com ênfase em música. Autor de 415 obras musicais. Membro da Academia Mundial de Trilha Sonora, membro da ASSIM (SP), membro da SBAT, membro do Museu Nacional da Poesia.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Andersen Viana has a Ph.D. in Music Composition from the Federal University of Bahia, Brazil (2010). He began his activities as a composer at the age of thirteen and as a music professor at the age of nineteen. He presently works as a composer-conductor and cultural producer, as well as a professor in Belo Horizonte, Brazil; in addition to offering lectures and workshops in various institutions both in Brazil and abroad. He did his first studies with his father ? Sebastião Vianna (assistant and reviser for the Brazilian composer, Heitor Villa-Lobos) ? and most recently furthered his studies in other institutions in Brazil, Italy, and Sweden ? namely UFMG, UFBA, Reale Accademia Filarmonica di Bologna, Arts Academy of Rome, Accademia Chigiana di Siena, and Royal College of Music in Stockholm. He has also published over forty articles both in Brazil and Europe. Viana has received 29 awards in Argentina, Brazil, Europe, and the USA, including the first prize in the Susanville Symphony Composition Competition-USA,first prize in the International Contest of Composition ?Lys Music Orchestra 2001? in Belgium, ?First Prize? and ?Audience Prize? in the ?Lambersart 2006 International Composition Competition? in France. To date, he has composed around 383 musical pieces for voice, as well as acoustic and electronic instruments. .

OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES:
Andersen Viana(1962), especializou-se em Composição Musical e Música para Cinema na Itália com Ennio Morricone, Luca Salvadori e Polizzi - freqüentando também os seminários com Giuseppe Tornatore, Ettore Scola e Armando Trovaiolli - e na Suécia(Accademia Chigiana di Siena, Reale Filarmonica di Bologna, Arts Academy of Rome, Royal College University of Music in Stockholm). Recebeu 28premiações por sua obra musical na Bélgica, Brasil, EUA, França e Itália. Em 2001, sua obra foi objeto de Dissertacao de Mestrado defendida na UNIRIO. Possui um "Banco de Projetos" com variadas propostas artísticas e culturais. Tem desenvolvido estudos e trabalhos nos seguintes países além do Brasil: Alemanha, Argentina, Bélgica, EUA, Suécia, Grécia, Honduras, Itália, França, Portugal, Rússia, República Tcheca, Reino Unido e Bulgaria.
Filmes realizados:
A Cartomante (Claudio Costa Val), 3:00:AM(Sérgio Gomes), Corações Ardentes (Ray Evans), Filhos de Adão (Afonso Nunes), O Próximo Passo, Gun?s Speech, (Sérgio Gomes), Perdidos em Abbey Road, Vivalma (Rubens Câmara), Manuelzão e Bananeira (Geraldo Elísio), Ofélia, Jogando para o Amanhã (Sergio Gomes), Opostos (Eduardo Rennó), Trem Fantasma (Sergio Gomes), Minas Portuguesa (Paulo Augusto Gomes), O Homem da Cabeça de Papelão (Carlos Canela), Retalhos do Taquaril (Cláudio Costa Val), Bem Próximo do Mal (Sérgio Gomes) e Condenado (Carlos Canela e Carlos Magno).

DADOS-BASICOS-DE-OUTRA-PRODUCAO-ARTISTIC.TITULO: Fantasia Brasileira (Brazilian Fantasy) para grupo de camera

SETORES-DE-ATIVIDADE.SETOR-DE-ATIVIDADE-1: Outros Serviços Coletivos, Sociais e Pessoais

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Before understanding Brazil music and its plurality it?s important to know a little bit about the Brazilian people formation. Brazil, the continental dimension country in the South America, is a country where there is one of the greatest musical diversity in the planet. This is due to a number of influences from the varied matrices that shaped the Brazilian nation from 1500 up to the present. In its genesis, the native indigenous, the European and the African people created the main tree from which several branches bloomed, developing into one after another. From all these influences, certainly outstands the rhythmic that comes from the African people brought to Brazil. From the African heritage we took rhythms, its strength; from the indigenous people their poetic and melancholic soul and from he European; their rationality. Brought to Brazil as slaves, the black African people was put to work in the sugar cane plantation and later on in the gold and diamond mining in the XVIII century in the State of Minas Gerais ? where the Brazilian Fantasy were composed. From the black African slaves rhythmic working music and their witchcrafts I have extracted the strong eighth-note motives and its silence. The use of syncopation so frequent in the batuque, samba and in many folk music in the country was systematically used and developed in the work starting from the first bar and finishing at the bar . Another element used in the work originated from the Brazilian folklore tradition is the improvisation. In the Congado Mineiro practices this is a fundamental element for the musical diversity of this folklore-religious rite, which, orally spread through the Afro-Brazilian is kept as part of the centuries long tradition in Brazil.
The Brazilian Fantasy is a short work ? about seven minutes ? but I think that no one will ignore it. This is based on some determinated structures and contains also a great variety of motives and elements. The compositional technique named
